channel.title: Stop spam clicking
channel.description: Well is there a code so if you click on the item like 500 times like a potion(even if you spam click it) It gives you the correct item back

item.title: Stop spam clicking
item.dc:creator: @o.O_O.o o.O O.o
item.description:
@o.O_O.o wrote:

It’s something really stupid that I’m overlooking… Answer your PM and then I’ll be able to focus more clearly :S

Read full topic

item.title: Stop spam clicking
item.dc:creator: @range_2her range 2her
item.description:
@range_2her wrote:

PotionHandler.java:4: illegal start of type if(c.strPotTimer == 0) { ^ PotionHandler.java:4: <identifier> expected if(c.strPotTimer == 0) { ^ PotionHandler.java:4: ';' expected if(c.strPotTimer == 0) { ^ PotionHandler.java:4: illegal start of type if(c.strPotTimer == 0) { ^ PotionHandler.java:4: <identifier> expected if(c.strPotTimer == 0) { ^ PotionHandler.java:4: ';' expected if(c.strPotTimer == 0) { ^

Read full topic

item.title: Stop spam clicking
item.dc:creator: @o.O_O.o o.O O.o
item.description:
@o.O_O.o wrote:

case 2440: if(c.strPotTimer == 0) { c.strPot = true; c.strPotTimer = 90; c.abc = c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[2]); c.cba = c.abc / 10; c.abc2 = c.cba * 2; if (c.abc2 <= 1) { c.abc2 = 2; } c.playerLevel[2] = c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[2]); c.playerLevel[2] += c.abc2; c.sendFrame126(""+c.playerLevel[2]+"", 4006); c.deleteItem(2440, 1); c.addItem(157, 1); c.updateRequired = true; c.appearanceUpdateRequired = true; GoOn = false; } break;

Try her.

Read full topic

item.description:
@range_2her wrote:

[quote=“o.O O.o, post:2, topic:278543”]You mean only one of said item?[/quote]ye

case 2440: c.strPot = true; c.strPotTimer = 90; c.abc = c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[2]); c.cba = c.abc / 10; c.abc2 = c.cba * 2; if (c.abc2 <= 1) { c.abc2 = 2; } c.playerLevel[2] = c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[2]); c.playerLevel[2] += c.abc2; c.sendFrame126(""+c.playerLevel[2]+"", 4006); c.deleteItem(2440, 1); c.addItem(157, 1); c.updateRequired = true; c.appearanceUpdateRequired = true; GoOn = false; break; that’s the code for it right now, and also how do I make it so stats go down after a while.
